head.title: Extract Images from Excel, Word, PDF & Other Document or Page via .NET
head.description: GroupDocs.Parser .NET API enables software programmers to extract images from different documents such as MS  Excel, Word, PowerPoint, PDF & more inside their .NET Apps.

header.title: Extract Images from PDF, DOCX, PPTX, MSG, XLSX Documents & Pages via C#.NET API
header.description: GroupDocs.Parser .NET API allows programmers to extract images from PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, EML, MSG, XLS, XLSX, CSV, ODT, RTF & EPUB documents or document's Pages.

about.title: How to Extract Images from {{EXT}} files via {{ProductName}}?
about.h1: Images can be used to deliver information in such a way that may not be expressible by words. Images help us in grabbing user’s attention and explain tough concepts with ease. Sometimes while reading documents, journals or benefiting from presentations we often found some fascinating images and wanted to download it. {{ProductFullName}} is a powerful API that help users to develop useful applications for extracting images from different types of documents and save them in PNG, JPEG, WebP, GIF, BMP and other formats. The API has included supports for text as well images extraction from some of the most commonly used file formats, such as PDF, Emails, Ebooks, Microsoft Office formats: Word (DOC, DOCX), PowerPoint (PPT, PPTX), Excel (XLS, XLSX), LibreOffice formats and many more. The API also fully supports documents parsing, extracting plain and structured text, text searching by keywords, extract metadata or images, containers as well as attachments and many more.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/parser/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProgLang}} developers to extract images from a {{EXT}} file by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Instantiate [Parser](https://reference.groupdocs.com/net/parser/groupdocs.parser/parser) object for the initial document;
content_left.step_2: Call [GetImages](https://reference.groupdocs.com/net/parser/groupdocs.parser/parser/methods/getimages) method and obtain collection of image objects;
content_left.step_3: Check if reader isn’t *null* (images extraction is supported for the document);
content_left.step_4: Iterate through the collection and get sizes, image types and image contents.

content_right.p4: Text searching via keyword as well as regular expression
